NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
NCS - Don’t Miss Out
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for letting us know you're interested in NCS! It’s a great way of meeting new people and gaining skills you can’t learn in class. We’re The Challenge and we run NCS in your area. Here is a taster of NCS...
Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YEpX7Q2-CVQ
All our dates are subject to availability - so please ask your parent or guardian to complete your application and select your preferred dates as soon as possible!
Over 200,000 young people have already taken part - don't miss your chance and sign up now for £50 or less!
The NCS Team - The Challenge
For more info, click on the link below: http://www.ncsthechallenge.org/programme/
Or, Sign Up Now! https://bookings.ncsthechallenge.org/
